entry.title: $2599 // Exposed Beams Renovated Spacious 2BR Williamsburg
entry.content:
Call this spacious, sunny, newly renovated 2BR apartment in Prime Williamsburg home. This spacious 2BR is in a well maintained pre war building, a unit that has been newly renovated but holds all the classic charm. Exposed beams, high ceilings, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, and brand new bathroom.

Open layout, true living/common area. Queen sized bedroom with two large windows and a smaller full sized bedroom with large window.



Prime Williamsburg
Great location located off G/L @ Metropolitan Ave
Many bars, restaurants, and shops in the area


Heat and hot water included

Call or text Zabrina today to schedule a viewing! show contact info

entry.title: $2400 // Both bedrooms ☺~☺ are BIG with real life closets
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 21672


2 Bed / 1.5 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Knickerbocker Av, Gates Av. Charming 2 bed in a two family townhouse set back from the street. Features tremendous space/light throughout. The living-room is gigantic and open, and connects to a separate kitchen with tons of counter/cabinet space! Both bedrooms are BIG with real life closets and get great natural light. If the tile floors seem weird, think of it as a good excuse to get a dope rug. AMAZING PRIVATE BACKYARD! Short walk to the Knickerbocker M and Kosciuszko J. Don't sleep on this one.

AMENITIES
Private backyard
Natural Light in Living Area
Eat In Kitchen
